description:
32 Plant-Based Recipes for your Thanksgiving Feast!
The holidays are my favorite time of year. It's filled with incredible food, fun celebrations, and lots of time with family and friends.
But I know it's also a source of stress for many families. And that's especially true for those trying to pull together a fully plant-based feast, on an occasion that is traditionally centered around turkey!
But I'm here to show you that Thanksgiving can be just as delicious with a table full of plant based treats! So I've pulled together all my favorite Thanksgiving worthy recipes in this handy e-book. So you can have a complete vegan feast at your fingertips, without spending hours scouring the internet!
Whether you're planning a completely vegan holiday, or just looking for a few special vegan-friendly dishes to round out your celebration, you'll find everything you need to make your holiday delicious!



About the Author
Nicole is the creator behind the popular plant-based food blogsÂ Oh My Veggies,Â Veg Kitchen, andÂ Delicious Everyday.
She's also a lifelong vegetarian, author of the hit cookbookÂ Weeknight One-Pot Vegan Cooking, and very busy mom!

Â What's Included?
The Vegan Thanksgiving CookbookÂ is packed full of plant based recipes that are fit for your holiday feast.
Start your holiday feast with plant powered appetizers like:

Olive Bar with Tofu "Feta"
Tempeh Fries with Horseradish Dill Sauce
Chickpea Tomato Dip and Spiced Pita Chips

Impress your guests with show-stopping vegan main dishes such as:

Mushroom Wellington
Veggie Pot Pies
Slow Cooker Pumpkin Chili
Whole Roasted Cauliflower in Tahini Sauce
Classic Veggie Shepherd's Pie
Rice and Pecan Stuffed Squash
Roasted Beetroot Napoleon with Walnut Chive Cream
Pumpkin Stuffed Cannelloni
Mushroom Bourguignon

Add on these incredible vegan Soups, Salads, and Sides to round out your holiday menu:

Roasted Butternut Squash & Quinoa Salad
Chickpea Avocado Chopped Salad with Tahini Maple Dressing
Chunky Sweet Potato Bisque
Butternut Squash and Apple Soup
Hearty Veggie & Lentil Soup
Corn & Sweet Potato Chowder
Soy and Maple Glazed Winter Squash
Mashed Potatoes with Onion Gravy
Maple and Tarragon Sweet Potatoes
Crispy Roast Potatoes
Sweet Potato Fritters with Cashew Lime Cream
Green Bean Salad with Miso Dressing

And finish the meal with easy, yet indulgent desserts like:

Pumpkin Pie Bars
Easy Pumpkin Cookies
Green Baklava
30-Minute Vegan Brownies
Peanut Butter Cookies
3-Ingredient Chocolate Mousse
Sweet & Salty Tahini Cookies
Dark Chocolate Cookies

There's a little something for everyone in this incredible collection of recipes. And while I put this book together with Thanksgiving in mind, you'll likely find yourself cooking these dishes all year long. They're that irresistible. ðŸ˜‰

FAQs
What format is the book in?
The book will be delivered as a PDF download. It's designed to be read on your computer, mobile device, or printed out.
Can I print the book?
Absolutely! In fact, I encourage you to print it out. Stick it in a three-ring binder, and keep it in your kitchen for easy reference.
How many times can I download the book?
As many times as you want. I lose stuff too! ðŸ˜‰
Are any of the recipes available on your website?
Some of them are available elsewhere and some of them are exclusive to this book.
What is the refund policy?
We don't offer refunds on digital products, as it unfortunately attracts fraud. But frankly, I've never been asked for one anyway. If you're not happy with the book, email me personally atÂ nicole@ohmyveggies.comÂ and I will do my best to make it right!
name: Vegan Thanksgiving Cookbook
